boardgame.name: EastFront (Second Edition)
EastFront 2
EastFront 2nd Edition
EastFront II
EastFront Second Edition
boardgame.description: Eastfront II is a update to the classic EastFront. It details the conflict between Germany and the Soviet Union during WWII. Players have to contend with production, supply, command control and weather to try and break the other side's lines. Individual, linkable 6-month scenarios cover the war from June 1941 through May 1945._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This title uses Columbia Games Block system, wooden blocks that stand upright with unit details only shown on one side, and rotate to take step reductions in strength. This provides a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;fog of war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;EastFront II is part of a re-release of the entire EuroFront series; the new series consists of EastFront II, WestFront II, and EuroFront II._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;EastFront II includes two maps: each 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; for a 44_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; playing area. The map area includes the Trans-Volga area, the Balkans, and Baku and Finland. All of the original EastFront scenarios are included and the larger playing area improves them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This copy of the game has never been played. The shrinkwrap has been opened, but the game is in excellent condition. The stickers have not been applied to the blocks. The counters have not been punched from the one counter sheet. Everything appears in the box - rules, dice, OB charts. I did not count the blocks. But there are a lot there. Box shows no visible signs of damage. Game sleeve looks pretty good after all of these years. Game comes from a non-smoking house. Also selling one copy of WestFront II and Rommel in the Desert. Please check my listings for details.
